full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KHROS PA'I RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035B DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I 'KHOR LO RGYUD 'BUM PA NAS PHYUNG BA, RTOG PA'I PHYOGS BKLAGS PAS GRUB PA, DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO MA HE'I GDONG CAN GYI DNGOS GRUB BSGRUB PA'I RTOG PA, DPAL AU RGYAN GYI GNAS CHEN PO NAS 'JAM DPAL KYI RGYUD LAS PHYUNG BA, RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO CHEN PO DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO ZHES BYA BA, BLA MA DAM PA, DKYIL 'KHOR CHEN PO'I SLOB DPON DPAL L'A LI TA BADZRAS PHYUNG NAS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO, ,
